answers.answer: Hello,this could be what is called a TIA (transient ischemic attach).  This is likely forerunner of an actual stroke in the future.You should visit your doctor asap telling him exactly what you just wrote here.Please also make sure the BP is well controlled.Let us know how you go.

question: I experienced a short period of blurred and double vision, dizziness, and weakness as well as nausea while walking with a shopping cart.  It passed after about one minute and a I had just a little nausea for another five minutes.  I am 52 years old,  high blood pressure and diabetes type II that is under control.
title: Mini Stroke ?
